Cell Type Annotation

2024-10-09

Identifying Malignant Cells

Detecting SNVs in Cells

POG calls SNVs using WGS data. These SNVs can be detected in scRNA-seq and scATAC-seq reads. Across all samples, the median proportion of SNVs detected in each sample is 0.0973367 for scRNA-seq and 0.4225946 for scATAC-seq. The proportion does not increase with increasing number of input SNVs.

Calculating an SNV Score

SNV scores are calculated for each cell by dividing the number of SNVs detected by the number of fragments that overlap an SNV.
